description: This file defines a translation agent that transcribes and translates an audio file using AI models, then saves the translated audio.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model and tools to perform tasks.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs a prompt or message to the user.

methods.name: run_response
methods.description: Executes the agent's response process and returns a response object.
